an5.34:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
an5.34:4.2: Atha kho sīho senāpati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.34:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sīho senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.34:4.5: “sakkā nu kho, bhante, bhagavā sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ paññāpetun”ti?
an5.34:5.2: “dāyako, sīha, dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo.
an5.34:5.3: Yampi, sīha, dāyako dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ.
an5.34:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, sīha, dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ santo sappurisā bhajanti.
an5.34:6.2: Yampi, sīha, dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ santo sappurisā bhajanti, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ.
an5.34:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, sīha, dāyakassa dānapatino kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.34:7.2: Yampi, sīha, dāyakassa dānapatino kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ.
an5.34:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, sīha, dāyako dānapati yaṃ yadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
an5.34:8.2: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
an5.34:8.4: Yampi, sīha, dāyako dānapati yaṃ yadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—
an5.34:8.5: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
an5.34:8.6: visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto, idampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ dānaphalaṃ.
an5.34:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, sīha, dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5.34:9.2: Yampi, sīha, dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati, idaṃ samparāyikaṃ dānaphalan”ti.
an5.34:10.1: Evaṃ vutte, sīho senāpati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.34:10.2: “yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṃ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi;
an5.34:10.4: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati bahuno janassa piyo manāpo.
an5.34:10.10: Ahaṃ, bhante, dāyako dānapati yaṃ yadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamāmi—
an5.34:10.11: yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—
an5.34:10.13: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā cattāri sandiṭṭhikāni dānaphalāni akkhātāni, nāhaṃ ettha bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi;
an5.34:10.15: Yañca kho maṃ, bhante, bhagavā evamāha:
an5.34:10.16: ‘dāyako, sīha, dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī’ti, etāhaṃ na jānāmi;
an5.34:10.17: ettha ca panāhaṃ bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti.
an5.34:10.19: Dāyako dānapati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatīti.
an5.34:11.1: * Dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū,
an5.34:11.2: Kittiñca pappoti yaso ca vaḍḍhati;
an5.34:12.4: Devānaṃ sahabyagatā ramanti te.
an5.34:13.1: Katāvakāsā katakusalā ito cutā,
an5.34:13.2: Sayaṃpabhā anuvicaranti nandanaṃ;
an5.34:13.6: Ramanti sagge sugatassa sāvakā”ti.
